game_plan.overview: An easy-to-play action game where the player must navigate through obstacles while avoiding enemies. The game supports a pause feature and clean quitting.
game_plan.mechanics: Player movement, enemy tracking, pausing, and collision detection.

file.name: main.py
file.description: This is the main entry point of the game. It initializes Pygame, creates the game window, and manages the main game loop.
file.imports: import pygame; from game import Game

file.name: game.py
file.description: This module contains the Game class, which handles the game state, main loop, event handling, updates game objects, and manages the pause functionality.
file.imports: import pygame; from settings import SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, WHITE

file.name: player.py
file.description: This module defines the Player class, which manages the player character's attributes, movements, and drawing on the screen.
file.imports: import pygame; from settings import PLAYER_COLOR

file.name: enemy.py
file.description: This module defines the Enemy class, which handles enemy attributes, movements, and interaction with the player.
file.imports: import pygame; from settings import ENEMY_COLOR

file.name: settings.py
file.description: This module contains constant variables for game settings, including screen size, colors, and initial parameters.
